document_data.title: Mama Needs Her New Pair of Shu
document_data.realm year: The Year of Great Change ([[1373 DR]]){{LJ}}
document_data.Summary: In the Year of Great Change ([[1373 DR]]), two children of the [[Simbuki]] [[shu]] tribe were abducted by the dreaded servants of the Tamara – [[black leopard katanga]]. The children, named after the spirits of the jungle, [[Ekana]], [[Huko]], were to be consumed by [[akathasa]]. A group of heroes embarked on the rescue journey across the [[Rayanna Savanna]], meeting a [[nature spirit]] [[Yato]] and a small army of Malatran [[mud-men]], before confronting the leader of the leopard katanga – chief [[Many-Teeth]].
